faq.contactDescription: If you couldn't find the answer to your question, our team is ready to help you digitize your menu.

items.question: How does Ganga-Menú work?
items.answer: Ganga-Menú is a platform that allows restaurants to create interactive digital menus. You upload photos of your dishes, add descriptions and prices, and get a unique link to share with your customers. It's easy, fast, and completely customizable.

items.question: What type of restaurants can use Ganga-Menú?
items.answer: Any type of food establishment: restaurants, cafes, bars, pizzerias, bakeries, food trucks, etc. Our platform adapts to any type of menu, from fast food to fine dining.

items.question: Is it difficult to update my menu?
items.answer: Not at all. You can update prices, add daily specials, change descriptions, or upload new photos in seconds from our admin panel. Changes are reflected immediately in your digital menu.

items.question: Can I customize my menu design?
items.answer: Yes, you can customize colors, add your restaurant's logo, organize categories as you prefer, and highlight your special dishes. Everything is done visually and intuitively.
